definition: make known to the public information that was previously known only to a few people or that was meant to be kept a secret
details:
verb
- make known to the public information that was previously known only to a few people or that was meant to be kept a secret
= example: make known to the public information that was previously known only to a few people or that was meant to be kept a secret
= synonyms: expose
- disclose to view as by removing a cover
= example: disclose to view as by removing a cover
= synonyms: expose
